meta.review_title: Telkom now only a botting network that doesnt even work
meta.review_content:
Horrible
they created automated bot responses to their phone calls
I am unable to speak to an operator
I have R260 on my prepaid account
when I try to load R249 on my account it says insufficient funds for no reason
not only that about a month ago it did the same thing and I had more than R30 over the sufficient fund amount
the fact that I am unable to express this concern to telkom makes them the worst mobile operator I have ever had
